comment: no tests, have to show up to get attendance points. only 400 points in the whole class. since there aren't test, lectures are pointless and long. she doesn't let you get on your computers either. 3 hours and a waste of time. definitely take it online if you can. no point in wasting time when you could be doing other things.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Graded by few things

comment: Class is really easy, not many things to complete. If you show up, you'll probably get an A, however the lectures are long and BORING. the class is almost 3 hours for NO reason. you don't even need to take notes on the content so it's basically pointless but you have to go to get the attendance points. take it online if you can!!!!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Graded by few things

comment: I love her so much! We only got 3 pages of paper and a group project this semester. PowerPoint project is easy. Also, she doesn't take attendance but she releases the class activity at the end of class. That is literally the attendance and the assignment. There is a free textbook on the internet so you don't need to buy the textbook either.

By far my favorite prof so far in the program. She truly cares about her students and wants all students to do well. She will put in extra work and listen to student feedback, she'll do whatever she can to make things better for us. In an incredibly stressful program, that's pretty cool. Also teaches clinical at Grady, HIGHLY recommend it!!!!!

Hands down, the best instructor I ever had. Firmly believes in "Unconditional Positive Regard" for all students, and goes above and beyond to make sure each student has the tools they need to succeed.
